forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 13C. Winds SE at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain for the afternoon. Windy. High 56F. Winds SE at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers overnight. Low 9C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain early...then remaining cloudy with thundershowers overnight. Low 48F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 12C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 53F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. SSW winds shifting to NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. SSW winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 42F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 54F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 40F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
